resources.string: Welcome! To continue provisioning your Alexa Powered device, please login with Amazon
To provision your new device, please make sure that your device is turned on. Now connect your phone to the Wi-Fi network with a name like
You are now connected to the device. To provision the device, please enter your Network credentials on the next page.
To make sure you are really connected to the device, please make sure you accept the system dialog informing you that network has no internet access.
To complete setup of your device, select your Home Wi-Fi network.
Location services are disabled. Please enable them to continue
Please check the device indicators for provisioning status.
To provision your new device, please make sure that your Phone\'s Bluetooth is turned on and within range of your new device.
To provision the device, please enter your Network credentials on the next page.
Make sure you are connected on the same Wi-Fi network as the Alexa device
Here are some of the many things you can ask Alexa
Alexa, set a timer for 20 minutes.
Alexa, add "Dinner with Mom" to my calendar.
Alexa, set an alarm for 6 a.m.
To learn more and access additional features, download the Amazon Alexa App.
Your device includes access to Alexa.
Connect your Amazon account to access personalized features.
Alexa allows you to use voice to play music and get news, sports scores, weather and more-all hands-free.
All you have to do is ask Alexa.

Device provisioning failed. Reason : Network not found. Please reset device to factory settings and retry.
Device provisioning failed. Reason : Wi-Fi Authentication failed. Please reset device to factory settings and retry.
Device provisioning failed. Reason : Unknown. Please reset device to factory settings and retry.
Error establishing session.\n Check if Proof of Possession(POP) is correct!
